pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sinto: single-cell analysis tools=================================.. image:: https://github.com/timoast/sinto/workflows/pytest/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/timoast/sinto/actions.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/install%20with-bioconda-brightgreen.svg?style=flat :target: http://bioconda.github.io/recipes/sinto/README.html.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/sinto.svg :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/sinto.. image:: https://pepy.tech/badge/sinto :target: https://pepy.tech/project/sintoSinto is a toolkit for processing aligned single-cell data. Sinto includes functions to:- Subset reads from a BAM file by cell barcode- Create a scATAC-seq fragments file from a BAM file- Add read tags to a BAM file according to cell barcode information- Add read groups based on read tags- Copy or move read tags to another read tag- Copy cell barcodes to/from read names or read tags- Add cell barcodes to FASTQ read namesRead the documentation at https://timoast.github.io/sinto
